include_friend_of.description: If set to true, you will also get back the info from the 'friendof' mode. Some clients show friends and friendof data in separate tabs/panes. If you are always going to load both, use this flag (as opposed to a tabbed dialog approach, where the user may not go to the second tab and thus would not need to load the friendof data.) friendof request variables can be used.

include_groups.description: If set to 1, you will also get back the info from the 'getfriendgroups' mode. See above for the reason why this would be useful.

friend_limit.description: If set to a numeric value greater than zero, this mode will only return the number of results indicated. Useful only for building pretty lists for display which might have a button to view the full list nearby.

include_bdays.description: If set to true, you will also get back the birthdays with the friends results below.
